channel.title: Best slayer base? Best slayer clothes?
channel.description:
Hi, I am wondering what the best source for slayer is or if there is a base with nothing and a slayer skill that I could put on it. Also what are the best clothes for slayer possible
(I had this in the server DL section and people were saying its the wrong one.)
